(42) (42)13.4.5.17 Special Investigations 13.4.5.17. 1 Spacecraft Vibration Accelerometer (GSFC) This experiment will, provide data for use in updating the analytic model of the ATS-6 spacecraft as well as for detecting and diagnosing anomalies during powered flight. It will be used further as an aid in the design of future spacecraft to be launched by the Titan III-C launch vehicle. Three vibration accelerometers are mounted on the spacecraft to sense space­ craft movement in lateral and vertical directions. An additional accelerometer is mounted on the Titan III-C third stage for vertical movement sensing.
